participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, enjoys trying new things and has a sweet tooth.
participant_1.background: my father is an electrician. i play the violin and the guitar. i love chocolate bars. i speak chinese.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and practical, values family and enjoys working with his hands.
participant_2.background: my cats are very special to me. i'm a construction worker. i enjoy building houses. i have 5 cats. my dad taught me everything i know.
